thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 20 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Extra Space Storage Reports Q4 FFO Per Share $1.17

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Extra Space Storage Reports Q4 FFO Per Share $1.17
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - Extra Space Storage Inc:
* Extra Space Storage Inc. REPORTS 2017 FOURTH QUARTER AND YEAR-END RESULTS
* Q4 FFO PER SHARE $1.17 * QTRLY CORE FFO PER SHARE $1.12 * QTRLY SAME-STORE REVENUE UP BY 4.9% AND SAME-STORE NET OPERATING INCOME UP BY 5.7%
* SEES 2018 FFO ATTRIBUTABLE TO COMMON STOCKHOLDERS AND UNIT HOLDERS OF $4.52 TO $4.62
* SEES 2018 CORE FFO ATTRIBUTABLE TO COMMON STOCKHOLDERS OF $4.55 TO $4.65
* Q4 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $1.08 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $4.50 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
